translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

To comply with what is required in your official letter of the 16th of this month, it is necessary that Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief of Police of the Department. Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu Residence of the Justice of the Peace of the department, November 20, 1841.

To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief of Police of the Boqueirão - Salso department. From the Justice of the Peace of the same. Official letter from the Justice of the Peace of the department dated November 20, received on the 22nd of the same month and replied to on the same day.
